document_data.caption: A map showing Eltabbar in northwest Thay.
document_data.name: tharch of Eltabbar
document_data.mainbody: '''Eltabbar''' was a tharch of [[Thay]] that encompassed the majority of the northern Thayan plateau, between the [[First Escarpment|First]] and [[Second Escarpment]]s. Its territory included the western shores of [[Lake Thaylembrar]] and the lands just west of the [[River Thay]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Eltabbar]]: The shining capital of Thay for many years,
* [[Lake Thaylembrar]]
* Ancient [[Nar]] ruins in the more remote parts of the tharch, which were home to [[demon]]s.
document_data.History: While the eruption of volcanoes in [[Thaymount]] during the [[Spellplague]] of [[1385 DR]] caused desolation across the entire nation, the weather and climate of Eltabbar had largely been normalized and protected by [[magic]]al means as of the year [[1479 DR]]. The finite number of agricultural farms within the tharch supported the living population of Thay during the latter half of the 15{{th}} century.
